name: Centurion's dress sword
uses: Completing the tutorial.

name: Zarosian training dummy
uses: Unlocking Katarina (student) as a researcher.

name: Opulent wine goblet
uses: Unlocking Dorian (student) as a researcher.

name: Crest of Dagon
uses: Accessing the Dungeon of Disorder in the Infernal Source (3 are used).

name: Ritual dagger
uses: Completing the I Made Dis achievement (not consumed).

name: 'Frying pan'
uses: Completing the Fallen Angels mystery.

name: Hallowed lantern
uses: Restoring the Statue of Hebe for the No Secrets Left to Steal achievement, a 'Frying pan' (damaged) and some materials.
Using it on the top of the lighthouse will award a hallowed lantern, which can be used on the statue of Hebe for a book that awards 50,000 Archaeology experience. (Requires 105 Archaeology)

name: Ancient timepiece
uses: Solving the Time Served mystery.

name: Legatus pendant
uses: Accessing the carcerem debris (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).

name: Ceremonial unicorn ornament
uses: Unlocking Eduardo (student) as a researcher.

name: Tetracompass (unpowered)
uses: Finding an ancient casket.

name: Everlight harp
uses: Restoring the Statue of Mesomedes for the No Secrets Left to Steal achievement and the hand of glory (Everlight).

name: Pontifex signet ring
uses: Entering Pontifex barrier at Kharid-et (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).
Entering the maximum security barrier in The Vault of Shadows (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).

name: 'Incite Fear' spell scroll
uses: Accessing the ice door in The Vault of Shadows while standing near the dial.

name: Chaos star
uses: Accessing the Hydra portal in the Infernal Source achievement (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).
Creating an Abyssal Gatestone with the chaotic gatestone.

name: Spiked dog collar
uses: Used for the Who's a Bad Boy? achievement (not consumed).

name: Dominion torch
uses: Restoring the statue of Padosan and getting the gold Dominion medal.
Opening a door in the Acropolis for the Hallowed Be... mystery.

name: Ikovian gerege
uses: Accessing the Stormguard Citadel (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).

name: Kantharos cup
uses: Creating the Cup of Nectar at the top of the Everlight lighthouse (level 105 Archaeology required).

name: Aviansie dreamcoat
uses: Trading with Armadyl for the Ring of Solomon relic.

name: Dominarian device
uses: Trading with Reldo for the Andvaranaut relic.

name: 'Exsanguinate' spell scroll
uses: Accessing the blood door in Kharid-et while standing near the dial.

name: Rod of Asclepius
uses: Restoring the Statue of Tromple.

name: Stormguard gerege
uses: Accessing Howl's Floating Workshop in the Stormguard Citadel (not consumed, but required every time and can be added to tool belt).

name: Garagorshuun anchor
uses: Used in the south-western tunnel (containing the Idithuun key) of the Warforge to obtain a green skull cave painting.

name: Ourg megahitter
uses: One is required to unlock Asgarnia Smith as part of your research team.

name: Golem heart
uses: One is required (along with a Golem instruction) to create a Golem framework and is consumed in the process.

name: Golem instruction
uses: One is required (along with a Golem heart) to create a Golem framework and is consumed in the process.
One is required to unlock Elissa Giovanni as part of your research team.

name: Hellfire katar
uses: Trading two Hellfire katars with Dagon the Gatekeeper for The Rings of Razulei relic (which requires completion of the Dagon Bye mystery).

name: Dorgeshuun spear
uses: One is used during the You Have Chosen... mystery (consumed).
One is used for the Stick It to Da Boss Man achievement (not consumed).

name: 'Forged in War' sculpture
uses: One is used during the You Have Chosen... mystery (consumed).

name: 'Smoke Cloud' spell scroll
uses: Accessing the smoke door in Kharid-et while standing near the dial.

name: 'Hallowed Be the Everlight' painting
uses: One is required for Hallowed Be... (not consumed).

name: Portable phylactery
uses: Solving The Forgotten Prisoner mystery.

name: 'Animate Dead' spell scroll
uses: Accessing the shadow door in The Vault of Shadows while standing near the dial.

name: Prototype godsword
uses: Creating The Subtle Blade relic (consumed).
Damaged version used for the That's Not How it Works achievement (not consumed).

name: Praetorian staff
uses: Creating the inquisitor staff.

damaged.name: Spear of Annihilation with shaft + spokes
